item.description: Crispy chips, low-effort dinners and fewer dishes to wash.

item.title: Police search for young girl missing on Sunshine Coast on New Years Eve
item.description: ﻿She was last seen wearing a purple floral dress and pink and white striped slides.

item.title: The $6 Aussie face mask going viral as the ‘luxury beauty dupe’ beauty editors did not see coming
item.description: Australian-made mask is getting rave reviews for delivering a seriously glowy complexion.

item.title: Passengers slam Queensland cruise ship after running aground off Papua New Guinea
item.description: It’s the second controversy the Coral Adventurer has been involved in within a few months.

item.title: Four deaths confirmed in a horror holiday season on Australian east coast
item.description: Four people have died and two are missing in waters off iconic coastlines.

item.title: T20 World Cup 2026: Matt Kuhnemann named in Australian squad alongside Pat Cummins, Cameron Green and Cooper Connolly
item.description: Australia have backed a number of injured stars to be fit for their push for a second World Cup crown.

item.title: New Year’s ‘digital detox’ resolution surging in popularity as Australians plan to unplug from their devices
item.description: Experts say even short breaks can boost sleep, focus, and mental health.

item.title: Teenager caught driving more than 100km/h over the speed limit in Canberra
item.description: The provisional driver had his little brother in the car at the time.

item.title: Dramatic Brisbane rooftop standoff ends as alleged car thieves are taken into custody
item.description: One suspect allegedly bolted onto a roof after encountering a naked resident.

item.title: New Years Eve celebrations backfire as blaze erupts on Victorian oval
item.description: the celebrations ended in an emergency situation.

item.title: Three teens charged after 12-year-old allegedly stabbed at Adelaide train station
item.description: The alleged offenders fled the scene on a train.

item.description: The former Olympic gold medallist is lucky to be alive.

item.title: Western Australian firefighters find two joeys hiding beneath burnt out tree after bushfire
item.description: ‘It’s moments like this that quietly stay with you long after the fire is out.’

item.description: The revelation will add further spice to the fifth and final Ashes Test.

item.title: QUT expert reveals how fruit nets manipulate consumer’s perception
item.description: ‘A delight for a colour scientist, but a sad moment for the consumer.’

item.description: ‘Those comments were inappropriate, irresponsible, and unsupported by any facts.’

item.title: Australian meat industry warns China’s beef quotas and tariffs could hurt $1 billion in trade
item.description: China has announced new measures that one peak body says could grind trade to a halt.

item.title: Crans-Montana fire: Several dozen killed, more than 100 injured in fire at bar at Swiss ski resort
item.description: Switzerland will now observe five days of official mourning.

item.title: Brazen German bank robber stops to pay for parking after $50 million heist
item.description: After committing a major crime, the robber decided to stick to some rules.

item.description: More than a dozen RFS and Fire and Rescue NSW crews are on scene.

item.description: ‘No one knows what’s happening.’

item.description: ‘It’s sort of lurked for many years.’

item.title: Secret 2005 cabinet papers reveal John Howard’s coalition government response to terror threat
item.description: Declassified documents show Australia's top spy agency warned of improvised explosive attacks and mass transport threats.

item.title: Search for missing snorkeler underway at Ledge Point north of Perth
item.description: Significant resources are searching from the sky and on the water.

item.description: ‘Good to see the T20 skipper back in form, unfortunately it was against us.’

item.title: Usman Khawaja announces retirement from Test cricket after SCG Test farewell
item.description: The Australian veteran has gone public two days before the Sydney Test.
